• {{items}}
import { Component , Input} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-item', templateUrl: './product-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-item.component.scss'] }) export class ProductItemComponent { // use of parent to child product-item=>child && @Input() name:any = []; type(value:any){ this.name.push(value); } }
